about.title: About Jequex
about.subtitle: Your ultimate e-commerce destination where quality meets convenience. We're passionate about bringing you the best products with an exceptional shopping experience.
about.missionDescription: At Jequex, we believe shopping should be effortless, enjoyable, and reliable. Our mission is to connect customers with high-quality products while providing outstanding service that exceeds expectations.
about.missionSecondary: We curate our product selection carefully, ensuring that every item meets our strict quality standards. From the latest tech gadgets to fashion essentials, we've got everything you need in one convenient place.
about.qualityFirstDescription: We never compromise on quality. Every product is carefully vetted to ensure it meets our high standards.
about.customerFocusedDescription: Your satisfaction is our priority. We're here to help and ensure you have the best shopping experience.
about.innovationDescription: We continuously evolve our platform to provide you with the latest features and best technology.
about.storyDescription: Founded in 2024, Jequex started with a simple vision: to create an e-commerce platform that truly puts customers first. What began as a small startup has grown into a trusted destination for thousands of shoppers worldwide.
about.storySecondary: Our team of passionate developers, designers, and customer service specialists work tirelessly to ensure that every aspect of your shopping experience is smooth, secure, and satisfying.
about.joinCommunityDescription: Be part of our growing community of satisfied customers. Follow us for updates, special offers, and the latest product launches.
about.fastShippingDescription: Get your orders delivered quickly with our reliable shipping partners worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, our team is here to help you every step of the way.
contact.emailSupportDescription: Get in touch via email for detailed inquiries
contact.phoneSupportDescription: Speak directly with our support team
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.faqDescription: Looking for quick answers? Check out our FAQ section for common questions about orders, shipping, returns, and more.
contact.readyToShopDescription: Don't have a question but want to explore our products? Browse our extensive catalog and find exactly what you're looking for.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more.

shipping.howLongAnswer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-7 business days within the continental US. Express shipping options are available for 1-2 business day delivery. International shipping may take 7-21 business days depending on the destination.
shipping.costAnswer: We offer free standard shipping on orders over $50. For orders under $50, standard shipping costs $5.99. Express shipping rates vary by location and package size, starting at $14.99.
shipping.tracking: How can I track my order?
shipping.trackingAnswer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can track your package using this number on our website or the carrier's website. You'll also receive updates on your order status through SMS if you've opted in.

returns.policyAnswer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be in original condition with tags attached. Some restrictions apply to certain categories like personal care items, custom products, and final sale items.
returns.howTo: How do I return an item?
returns.howToAnswer: To return an item, log into your account and select 'Return Items' from your order history. Print the prepaid return label and ship the item back to us. You can also initiate returns by contacting our customer service team.
returns.refund: When will I receive my refund?
returns.refundAnswer: Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days after we receive your returned item. The refund will be credited to your original payment method. Please allow 5-10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement.

orders.modify: Can I modify my order after placing it?
orders.modifyAnswer: Orders can be modified within 1 hour of placement if they haven't been processed yet. After that, you may need to place a new order and return the original items. Contact our customer service team immediately if you need to make changes.
orders.cancel: How do I cancel my order?
orders.cancelAnswer: Orders can be cancelled within 1 hour of placement through your account dashboard. If your order has already been processed or shipped, you'll need to return the items once received following our standard return process.
orders.status: How do I check my order status?
orders.statusAnswer: You can check your order status by logging into your account and viewing your order history. You'll also receive email updates at each stage: order confirmation, processing, shipped, and delivered.

payment.methods: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.methodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. We also offer buy-now-pay-later options through Klarna and Afterpay for qualified purchases.
payment.securityAnswer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information. We're PCI DSS compliant and never store your full credit card information on our servers. All transactions are processed through secure payment processors.

account.create: Do I need an account to make a purchase?
account.createAnswer: While you can checkout as a guest, creating an account allows you to track orders, save addresses, view purchase history, earn rewards points, and receive personalized recommendations. It also makes future checkouts faster.
account.password: How do I reset my password?
account.passwordAnswer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email address. We'll send you a password reset link. If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, check your spam folder or contact customer service.

support.title: Still Have Questions?
support.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer support team is here to help you 24/7.
